I was skeptical about the .torrent because I figured there was no way a 1080p movie could fit in a 1.5GB file. The video quality was very good but the extra bullshit ruined it for me. No one needs a greeting embedded within the video file, a reference to some websites, or even a small bug of your name in the movie. Not cool dude.
